participant_1.background:
I'm a young person who doesn't want to continue my family's business.
i like watching british tv shows and movies.
i am not very tall.
I'm glad I have such fond memories of fishing with my dad.
I am passionate about being a good dog parent to my collie.

participant_2.background:
I took my dogs for a walk in the woods and saw a deer.
I love making short films with my camcorder.
I miss the days of being a kid, but I'm trying to make the best of my current situation.
i am a free spirit.
I met the love of my life while working at the hospital.

content.text: Hey there! I just got back from taking my collie for a walk in the park.
Oh that sounds fun! I miss going for walks in the woods with my dogs.
Yeah it was really nice. We saw some deer too!
Wow! That's so cool. I love seeing deer in the wild.
Me too. It makes me feel like I'm in a nature documentary or something.
Yeah, right? It's so peaceful and relaxing.
Have you ever thought of making a short film about your experience with deer?
That's such a cool idea! I never thought of that before.
You should! I think it would be really neat.
Thanks for the suggestion! I might just do that.
Oh good! I can't wait to see it.
Well, it might be a while before I get it done, but I'll let you know.
Sounds good. I can't wait to see it
